txt.en: A Mischief-maker is a master of distracting his foe's attention in combat.
You have begun to follow the Path of the Mischief-maker. If you follow this path to its end, you may learn how to become a master of mischief, increasing your abilities to distract foes in combat.
Begin down the Path of the Mischief-maker
There are many challenges on along the Path of the Mischief-maker. Taking the first step may be the most difficult....
